p: Cytokines as inflammatory mediators are implicated in the pathogenesis of various acute as well as chronic diseases such as alcoholic liver disease [ 9– 11]. It has been demonstrated that during chronic liver damage and activation of nuclear factor- κ-light-chain-enhancer of activated B cells, increased expression of TLR3 and TLR7 and increased secretion of proinflammatory cytokines are associated with human end-stage ALD [ 12].
